groupInformation.terms: Please contact us to make sure we have the right bed configuration for your group booking. We have flexibility on how many beds and how we configure the apartments to cater for your group.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
A 50% NON-REFUNDABLE deposit payment is required to secure the booking. The remaining balance due on the booking will be required to be paid 4 weeks prior to check-in. 
A bond may be required as well.

houseRules.notes:
Self-Check-In Details
Every person staying needs to be able to show valid photo ID and credit card details (passport, NZ 18+ card, or NZ driver’s license) if requested prior to checking-in. School students under 18 yrs in group bookings are not required to have ID, however a list of names would be helpful. 
Please make sure you ALL have this to avoid disappointment.
Early check-ins can be available on request, please call at least the day before arrival so we can organize this for you, subject to availability. 
Check in is 2pm and we do not generally allow early check-ins to the rooms as we are busy cleaning and preparing them for you. However you may arrive earlier as we can store your luggage until your room is ready. Check out is 10.30am. 

Please note, we do charge a FULL NON-REFUNDABLE 50% deposit for group bookings of 6+ guests, bookings over public holiday weekends and special events. A 3.7% surcharge for credit card payments will be apply.

Payment: Please ensure payment is made in full for your booking prior to arrival/check-in date. If paying by credit card, please call us to give your card number over the phone. Thankyou. 

Standard Cancellation Policy
Standard Cancellation Policy
30 days in advance, otherwise your booking will be NON-REFUNDABLE. 
Long Weekends: For all Public Holiday long weekends, we have a minimum 2-night stay requirement. This applies to: Anniversary Weekend, Waitangi Day, Easter, Matariki Weekend, Queens Birthday and Labour Day weekend.

Christmas / New Years:
As per previous years, we set a few conditions in place to ensure a pleasant stay for all our guests.
Minimum Age:
For New Year's only: All guests are required to be over 18 years of age with valid photo ID (passport or drivers license) to be produced upon arrival to avoid disappointment. If you are under 18 yrs old you will be required to have a legal guardian with you. 
Minimum Stay:
For Christmas & New Year's: We have a minimum night stay policy throughout this period, with no-one checking in or out on 1st January. We are not open Christmas Day for check-in's so please book in either Christmas Eve on the 24th December, or Boxing Day on the 26th December. This allows our staff to have Christmas Day with their families. 
Pets:
Pets are welcome and we ask that you not allow them to sleep on beds or furniture for hygiene purposes.
